content: > this pattern is available in several > places and in several slight > variations on the internet so i > cannot claim it as my original design > - the author is unknown this is a visual tutorial for those of you who > like me thought this pattern seemed > very intimidating at first but i > quickly discovered that it s a piece > of cake this pattern is done in > american english british stitch names > are given in brackets size approximately 66cm x 82 cm h 5 mm hook approximately 450 g yarn
